name: Soccer Manager 2023: Football
summary: Soccer Manager 2023 is the latest iteration of the in-depth football manager simulation game. Built on 16 years of development experience and over 50 million downloads, Soccer Manager 2023 introduces a worldwide Bundesliga licence, the brand-new career mode Create-a-Club and dynamic live transfers along with improvements in the 3D matchday engine. If you are passionate about the game, it is the ultimate football manager game for you!
